title: Modify a Rental Car Booking
description: A customer needs to extend their car rental by two days.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's existing car rental booking.
Check if the vehicle is available for the two extra days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the car is not booked by another customer and can be extended.

tasks.description: Update the booking with the new return date and inform the customer of the additional cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully modifies the booking and communicates the new total price.
